page.title: 08OUR VILLAGE
page.content: {LANGWORTH In{Langworth}there are not many people.There is a play park in { {Langworth.}The school is very small.There are shops in{Langworth}and a church. The church is not very big but our vicar,The Reverend Raymond Gibson has a group of four parishes.This is a Church of England (Controlled) School.Our special assemblies and celebrations at Christmas, Harvest and so on are often held in one of the churches before a large congregation. Our village is small and has few social activities.However the Fete and other events are well attended.
